price: Wͻn mu nnipa papa no (anaasε wͻn mu adantamu no) kaa sε: “Manka ankyerε mo sε, adεn na mo mmͻ (Nyankopͻn) abodin?”
arabic: قَالَ أَوۡسَطُهُمۡ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكُمۡ لَوۡلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla awsaṭuhum alam aqul lakum lawlā tusabbiḥūna
